alert.note: Alert for Southern Clearwater Mountains; Western Lemhi County (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 25 at 7:10PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Lemhi, east central Idaho and west central Ravalli Counties through 800 PM MDT/700 PM PDT/... At 709 PM MDT/609 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 29 miles southwest of Conner, or 45 miles southwest of Hamilton, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Lemhi, east central Idaho and west central Ravalli Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Southern Clearwater Mountains; Western Lemhi County
